info.title: Represents the response generated after a CloseChatRequest has been processed.

parameter.name: $completeClose
parameter.description: A value of "true" indicates that the message input box should be removed along with the chat from the front-end.

parameter.name: $chatId
parameter.description: The ID of the Chat that was requested to be closed.

method.name: getChatId
method.returndescription: The ID of the Chat that was requested to be closed.

method.name: isCompleteClose
method.returndescription: See the constructor for the definition of a "completely closed" chat.

method.name: toArray
